data: dell | southern shore of Lake Superior
In the center of a thickly-wooded dell, situated about three miles from the southern shore of Lake Superior, a half-breed youth, clad in the habiliments of a Chippewa Indian, discussed a frugal meal.
Silver Rifle, the Girl Trailer; Or, The White Tigers of Lake Superior
